diff_act: 1.display an error message to the controller

regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically retry to establish a call to the destination if the initial attempt is unsuccessful, and display an error message to the controller after a specified number of failed attempts.

regen.absent_element: retry mechanism for failed call connections
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically retry to establish a call connection if the initial attempt fails, with a maximum number of retries before providing an error indication to the driver.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling multiple call attempts and retry limits
regen.new_specification: The system shall limit the number of retry attempts to establish a call connection and provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when the maximum number of attempts is reached.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
